Eric Schmidt also took on Google's competition with Apple. Google partners with Apple, he said, on search, maps and YouTube. It competes, of course, on phones. Google also might in theory compete with Apple's Macintosh computer business with its Chrome OS hardware that Google hopes` to announce later this year,' Eric Schmidt said, Adam Lashinsky reports. . By this summer, developers with games on Facebook's platform will have to accept payments made with the social network's own in-house currency, Facebook Credits. By requiring game developers to offer Facebook Credits, it brings them inline with what you see on other gaming platforms such as Microsoft or Nintendo, said Todd Northcutt of GameSpy Technology. According to the Morning News, Dwaine Caraway on Tuesday told Dallas sports radio station 1310 AM that he honored Michael Vick because he thinks the quarterback can be a role model for kids. These kids are the future, and we don't have enough folks out here joining hands and turning lives around, Dwaine Caraway said, according to the newspaper.
